   20: 
   21: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   22: %%%
   23: %%% Define to run outside of test server
   24: %%%
   25: %%% -define(STANDALONE,1).
   26: %%%
   27: %%%
   28: %%% Define for debug output
   29: %%%
   30: %%% -define(debug,1).
   31: 
   32: -module(trace_meta_SUITE).
   33: 
   34: %% Exported end user tests
   35: -export([basic_test/0, return_test/0, on_and_off_test/0, stack_grow_test/0,
   36: 	 info_test/0, tracer_test/0, combo_test/0, nosilent_test/0]).
   37: 
   38: %% Internal exports
   39: -export([exported/1, exported_wrap/1, loop/4, id/1, receiver/1]).
   40: 
   41: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   42: %% Test server related stuff
   43: %%
   44: 
   45: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   46: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   47: -export([config/2]).
   48: -else.
   49: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   50: -endif.
   51:  
   52: -ifdef(debug).
   53: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   54: -define(line, erlang:display({?MODULE,?LINE}), ).
   55: -endif.
   56: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   57: -else.
   58: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   59: -define(line, noop, ).
   60: -endif.
   61: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   62: -endif.
   63:  
   64: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   65: config(priv_dir,_) ->
   66:     ".".
   67: -else.
   68: %% When run in test server.
   69: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   70: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   71: -export([basic/1, return/1, on_and_off/1, stack_grow/1, 
   72: 	 info/1, tracer/1, combo/1, nosilent/1]).
   73: 	 
   74: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   78:     shutdown(),
   79:     ok.
   80: 
   81: suite() ->
   82:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   83:      {timetrap, {minutes, 5}}].
   84: 
   85: all() ->
   86:     [basic, return, on_and_off, stack_grow, info, tracer,
   87:      combo, nosilent].
   88: 
   89: %% Tests basic meta trace
   90: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   91:     basic_test().
   92: 
   93: %% Tests return trace
   94: return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     return_test().
   96:  
   97: %% Tests turning trace parameters on and off
   98: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     on_and_off_test().
  100:  
  101: %% Tests the stack growth during return traces
  102: stack_grow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     stack_grow_test().
  104:  
  105: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  106: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  107:     info_test().
  108:  
  109: %% Tests stopping and changing tracer process
  110: tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  111:     tracer_test().
  112: 
  113: %% Tests combining local call trace with meta trace
  114: combo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     combo_test().
  116: 
  117: %% Tests that meta trace is not silenced by the silent process flag
  118: nosilent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  119:     nosilent_test().
  120: 
  121: -endif.
  122: 
  123: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  124: %% Result examination macros
  125: 
  126: -define(CT(P,MFA),{trace,P,call,MFA}).
  127: -define(CTT(P, MFA),{trace_ts,P,call,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
  128: -define(RF(P,MFA,V),{trace,P,return_from,MFA,V}).
  129: -define(RFT(P,MFA,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,MFA,V,{_,_,_}}).
  130: -define(RT(P,MFA),{trace,P,return_to,MFA}).
  131: -define(RTT(P,MFA),{trace_ts,P,return_to,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
  132: -define(NM, receive_no_next(100)).
  133: 
  134: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  135: %%% The Tests
  136: %%%
  137: 
  138: basic_test() ->
  139:     Pid = setup(),
  140:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[meta]),
  141:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  142:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  143:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  144:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  145:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  146:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  147:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[meta]),
  148:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  149:     ?NM,
  150:     [1,1,1,0] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  151:                                      exported_wrap(1)
  152:                              end),
  153:     ?NM,
  154:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[meta]),
  155:     [1,1,1,0] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  156:                                      exported_wrap(1)
  157:                              end),
  158:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,_,_}) = receive_next(), %% The fun
  159:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  160:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  161:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  162:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  163:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  164:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[meta]),
  165:     shutdown(),
  166:     ?NM,
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  170: 
  171: return_test() ->
  172:     Pid = setup(),
  173:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  174: 			 [meta]),
  175:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  176: 			 [meta]),
  177:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  178:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  179:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  180:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  181:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  182:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  183:     ?CTT(Pid,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next(),
  184:     ?RFT(Pid,{erlang,phash2,2},0) = receive_next(),
  185:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,1},[1,0]) = receive_next(),
  186:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,1},[1,0]) = receive_next(),
  187:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,1},[1,1,0]) = receive_next(),
  188:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,1},[1,1,1,0]) = receive_next(),
  189:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[1,1,1,0]) = receive_next(),
  190:     shutdown(),
  191:     ?NM,
  192:     ok.
  193: 
  194: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  195: 
  196: on_and_off_test() ->
  197:     Pid = setup(),
  198:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[meta]),
  199:     LocalTail = fun() ->
  200:                         local_tail(1)
  201:                 end,
  202:     [1,0] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  203:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  204:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[global]),
  205:     [1,0] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  206:     ?NM,
  207:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[meta]),
  208:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  209:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  210:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},[],[meta]),
  211:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  212:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  213:     ?CTT(Pid,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next(),
  214:     shutdown(),
  215:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[meta]),
  216:     N = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},true,[meta]),
  217:     case erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[meta]) of
  218:         N -> ok;
  219:         Else ->
  220:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else}})
  221:     end,
  222:     case erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[meta]) of
  223:         N -> ok;
  224:         Else2 ->
  225:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else2}})
  226:     end,
  227:     %% ?NM,
  228:     %% Can't check for erlang:*/* stuff since common_test or test_server
  229:     %% will likely call list_to_binary in the logger. just drain any potential
  230:     %% message
  231:     ok = flush(),
  232:     ok.
  233: 
  234: flush() ->
  235:     receive _ -> flush() after 0 -> ok end.
  236: 
  237: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  238: 
  239: stack_grow_test() ->    
  240:     Pid = setup(),
  241:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,loop,4},
  242: 				   [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],[meta]),
  243:     Num = 1 bsl 15,
  244:     Surface =
  245: 	fun (This, ?RFT(P,{?MODULE,loop,4},N), N) when P == Pid->
  246: 		if N == Num ->
  247: 			?NM,
  248: 			ok;
  249: 		   true ->
  250: 			This(This, receive_next(), N+1)
  251: 		end
  252: 	end,
  253:     Dive =
  254: 	fun (This, ?CTT(P,{?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,N]}), N)
  255: 	    when P == Pid->
  256: 		if N == 0 ->
  257: 			Surface(Surface, receive_next(), 0);
  258: 		   true ->
  259: 			This(This, receive_next(), N-1)
  260: 		end
  261: 	end,
  262:     apply_slave(?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,Num]),
  263: %     apply_slave_async(?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,Num]),
  264: %     List = collect(test_server:seconds(5)),
  265:     ok = Dive(Dive, receive_next(), Num),
  266:     ?NM,
  267:     ok.
  268: 
  269: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  270: 
  271: info_test() ->
  272:     setup(),
  273:     Prog = [{['$1'],[{is_integer,'$1'}],[{message, false}]}, {'_',[],[]}],
  274:     Self = self(),
  275:     GoOn = make_ref(),
  276:     Pid =
  277: 	spawn_link(
  278: 	  fun () ->
  279: 		  erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, 
  280:                                        Prog, [{meta, Self}]),
  281: 		  Self ! {self(), GoOn}
  282: 	  end),
  283:     receive {Pid, GoOn} -> ok end,
  284:     {traced,false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, traced),
  285:     {match_spec, false} =
  286: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, match_spec),
  287:     {meta, Self} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta),
  288:     {meta_match_spec, MMS} =
  289: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  290:     case MMS of
  291:         Prog ->
  292:             ok;
  293:         Wrong ->
  294:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,
  295:                                [{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},
  296:                                 meta_match_spec]},
  297:                   {expected, Prog}, {got, Wrong}})
  298:     end,
  299:     erlang:garbage_collect(self()),
  300:     receive
  301:     after 1 ->
  302:               ok
  303:     end,
  304:     io:format("~p~n",[MMS]),
  305:     {meta_match_spec,MMS2} =
  306: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  307:     io:format("~p~n",[MMS2]),
  308:     case MMS2 of
  309:         Prog ->
  310:             ok;
  311:         Wrong2 ->
  312:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,
  313:                                [{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},
  314:                                 meta_match_spec]},
  315:                   {expected, Prog}, {got, Wrong2}})
  316:     end,
  317:     {all, [_|_]=L} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, all),
  318:     {value, {meta, Self}} = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, L),
  319:     {value, {meta_match_spec, MMS}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, L),
  320: 
  321:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [meta]),
  322:     {meta_match_spec, []} =
  323: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  324: 
  325:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [meta]),
  326:     {meta, false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta),
  327:     {meta_match_spec, false} =
  328: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  329:     {all, false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, all),
  330:     shutdown(),
  331:     ?NM,
  332:     ok.
  333: 
  334: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  335: 
  336: tracer_test() ->
  337:     Slave = setup(),
  338:     Self = self(),
  339: 
  340:     MatchSpec = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  341:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(3, Self) end),
  342:     Setter = spawn_link(
  343:                fun () ->
  344:                        erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  345:                                             MatchSpec,
  346:                                             [{meta,Tracer1}]),
  347:                        erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  348:                                             MatchSpec,
  349:                                             [{meta,Tracer1}]),
  350:                        Self ! {self(), done}
  351:                end),
  352:     receive {Setter, done} -> ok end,
  353:     Ref = make_ref(),
  354:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref]),
  355:     {Tracer1,?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref]})} = receive_next(100),
  356:     {Tracer1,?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]})} = receive_next(100),
  357:     {Tracer1,?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} = receive_next(100),
  358:     %% Initiate a return_trace that will fail since the tracer just stopped
  359:     Slave ! Ref,
  360:     receive_no_next(100),
  361:     %% The breakpoint has not been hit since the tracer stopped
  362:     {meta,Tracer1} =
  363: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  364:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  365: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  366:     {meta,Tracer1} =
  367: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  368:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  369: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  370:     %% Initiate trace messages that will fail
  371:     Ref2 = make_ref(),
  372:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref2]),
  373:     Slave ! Ref2,
  374:     receive_no_next(100),
  375:     {meta,[]} =
  376: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  377:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} = 
  378: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  379:     {meta,[]} =
  380: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  381:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  382: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  383:     %% Change tracer
  384:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(4, Self) end),
  385:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  386:                          MatchSpec,
  387:                          [{meta,Tracer2}]),
  388:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  389:                          MatchSpec,
  390:                          [{meta,Tracer2}]),
  391:     Ref3 = make_ref(),
  392:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref3]),
  393:     {Tracer2,?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref3]})} = receive_next(),
  394:     {Tracer2,?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]})} = receive_next(),
  395:     {Tracer2,?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} = receive_next(),
  396:     %% Change tracer between call trace and return trace
  397:     Tracer3 = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(4, Self) end),
  398:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  399:                          MatchSpec,
  400:                          [{meta,Tracer3}]),
  401:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  402:                          MatchSpec,
  403:                          [{meta,Tracer3}]),
  404:     Slave ! Ref3,
  405:     %% The return trace should still come from Tracer2
  406:     {Tracer2,?RFT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref3)} = receive_next(),
  407:     Ref4 = make_ref(),
  408:     %% Now should Tracer3 be used
  409:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref4]),
  410:     Slave ! Ref4,
  411:     {Tracer3,?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref4]})} = receive_next(),
  412:     {Tracer3,?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]})} = receive_next(),
  413:     {Tracer3,?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} = receive_next(),
  414:     {Tracer3,?RFT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref4)} = receive_next(),
  415:     %% The breakpoint has not been hit since the tracer stopped
  416:     {meta,Tracer3} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  417:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  418: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  419:     {meta,Tracer3} =
  420: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  421:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  422: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  423:     shutdown(),
  424:     ?NM,
  425:     ok.
  426: 
  427: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  428: 
  429: combo_test() ->
  430:     Slave = setup(),
  431:     Self = self(),
  432: 
  433:     MatchSpec = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  434:     Flags = lists:sort([call, return_to]),
  435:     LocalTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(6, Self) end),
  436:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(4, Self) end),
  437:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  438:                              MatchSpec,
  439:                              [local,{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  440:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  441:                              MatchSpec,
  442:                              [local,{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  443:     1 = erlang:trace(Slave, true,
  444:                      [{tracer,LocalTracer} | Flags]),
  445:     %%
  446:     {all, TraceInfo1} =
  447: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, all),
  448:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  449: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  450:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} =
  451: 	lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo1),
  452:     {meta_match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  453: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  454:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  455: 	lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo1),
  456:     {traced,local} =
  457: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, traced),
  458:     {value,{traced,local}} =
  459: 	lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo1),
  460:     {match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  461: 	erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, match_spec),
  462:     {value,{match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  463: 	lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo1),
  464:     %%
  465:     {all, TraceInfo2} =
  466: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, all),
  467:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  468: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  469:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} =
  470: 	lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo2),
  471:     {meta_match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  472: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  473:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  474: 	lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo2),
  475:     {traced,local} =
  476: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, traced),
  477:     {value,{traced,local}} =
  478: 	lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo2),
  479:     {match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  480: 	erlang:trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, match_spec),
  481:     {value,{match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  482: 	lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo2),
  483:     %%
  484:     {flags,Flags1} = erlang:trace_info(Slave, flags),
  485:     Flags = lists:sort(Flags1),
  486:     {tracer,LocalTracer} = erlang:trace_info(Slave, tracer),
  487:     %%
  488:     Ref = make_ref(),
  489:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref]),
  490:     Slave ! Ref,
  491:     ?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref]}) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  492:     ?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  493:     ?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  494:     ?RFT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  495:     ?CT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref]}) = receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  496:     ?CT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  497:     case {receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  498: 		receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer)} of
  499: 	      {?RF(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0),
  500: 	       ?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1})} ->
  501: 		  ok;
  502: 	      {?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1}),
  503: 	       ?RF(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} ->
  504: 		ok;
  505: 	      Error1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Error1})
  506: 	end,
  507:     case {receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  508: 		receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer)} of
  509: 	      {?RF(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref),
  510: 	       ?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,slave,1})} ->
  511: 		  ok;
  512: 	      {?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,slave,1}),
  513: 	       ?RF(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref)} ->
  514: 		  ok;
  515: 	      Error2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Error2})
  516: 	  end,
  517:     shutdown(),
  518:     ?NM,
  519:     ok.
  520: 
  521: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  522: %% Use case for Inviso meta tracing:
  523: %% Setup silent local call tracing, and start it using meta trace.
  524: 
  525: nosilent_test() ->
  526:     Pid = setup(),
  527:     Trigger = {?MODULE,id,1},
  528:     TriggerMS = [{[start],[],[{silent,false}]},
  529:                  {[stop],[],[{silent,true},{return_trace}]}],
  530:     1 = erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call,silent,return_to]),
  531:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  532:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,local2,1},
  533:                              [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  534:                              [local]),
  535:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,1},false,[local]),
  536:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(Trigger,false,[local]),
  537:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(Trigger,TriggerMS,[meta]),
  538:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  539:     receive_no_next(17),
  540:     start = apply_slave(?MODULE, id, [start]),
  541:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,id,[start]})       = receive_next(),
  542:     [2,2,2,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[2]),
  543:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[2]}) = receive_next(),
  544:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[2]})      = receive_next(),
  545:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[2]})         = receive_next(),
  546:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[2]})        = receive_next(),
  547:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[2]})    = receive_next(),
  548:     ?RF(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,1}, [2,0])   = receive_next(),
  549:     ?RT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,1})           = receive_next(),
  550:     ?RT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,1})        = receive_next(),
  551:     ?RT(Pid,{?MODULE,slave,1})           = receive_next(),
  552:     stop = apply_slave(?MODULE, id, [stop]),
  553:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,id,[stop]})        = receive_next(),
  554:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,id,1}, stop)       = receive_next(),
  555:     [3,3,3,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[3]),
  556:     receive_no_next(17),
  557:     shutdown(),
  558:     ok.
  559: 
  560: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  561: %% Trace target functions
  562: 
  563: loop(D1,D2,D3,0) ->
  564:     io:format("~p~n",[[D1,D2,D3]]),
  565:     0;
  566: loop(D1,D2,D3,N) ->
  567:     max(N,loop(D1,D2,D3,N-1)).
  568: 
  569: id(X) ->
  570:     X.
  571: 
  572: 
  573: exported_wrap(Val) ->
  574:     exported(Val).
  575: 
  576: exported(Val) ->
  577:     [Val | local(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  578: 
  579: local(Val) ->
  580:     [Val | local2(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  581: 
  582: local2(Val) ->
  583:     local_tail(Val). %% Tail recursive call
  584: 
  585: local_tail(Val) ->
  586:     [Val , erlang:phash2(1,1)]. 
  587: 
  588: 
  589: 
  590: receiver(Msg) ->
  591:     erlang:phash2(1,1),
  592:     receive Msg -> Msg end.
  593: 	    
  594: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  595: %% Trace target process and utilities
  596: 
  597: slave(Sync) ->
  598:     Sync ! sync,
  599:     receive
  600: 	{From,apply, M, F, A} ->
  601: 	    ?dbgformat("Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
  602: 	    Res = apply(M,F,A),
  603: 	    ?dbgformat("done Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
  604: 	    From ! {apply, Res},
  605: 	    erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,1},false,[meta]),
  606: 	    slave(From);
  607: 	{From, lambda, Fun} ->
  608: 	    Res = Fun(),
  609: 	    From ! {lambda, Res},
  610: 	    erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,1},false,[meta]),
  611: 	    slave(From);
  612: 	die ->
  613: 	    exit(normal)
  614:     end.
  615: 
  616: setup() ->
  617:     trace_off(),
  618:     Self = self(),
  619:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> slave(Self) end),
  620:     receive sync -> ok end,
  621:     put(slave,Pid),
  622:     Pid.
  623: 
  624: shutdown() ->
  625:     trace_off(),
  626:     Pid = get(slave),
  627:     case (catch is_process_alive(Pid)) of
  628: 	true ->
  629: 	    Ref = erlang:monitor(process,Pid),
  630: 	    Pid ! die,
  631: 	    receive
  632: 		{'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,_} ->
  633: 		    ok
  634: 	    end;
  635: 	_ ->
  636: 	    ok
  637:     end.
  638: 
  639: trace_off() ->
  640:     erlang:trace(all, false, [all]),
  641:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[]),
  642:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[local]),
  643:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[meta]),
  644:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load,false,[]),
  645:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load,false,[local]),
  646:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load,false,[meta]),
  647:     ok.
  648: 
  649: apply_slave_async(M,F,A) ->
  650:     Slave = get(slave),
  651:     Pid = 
  652: 	spawn(
  653: 	  fun () ->
  654: 		  Slave ! {self(),apply, M, F, A},
  655: 		  receive
  656: 		      {apply, _} ->
  657: 			  receive
  658: 			      sync ->
  659: 				  ok
  660: 			  end
  661: 		  end
  662: 	  end),
  663:     Pid.
  664: 
  665: apply_slave(M,F,A) ->
  666:     Pid = get(slave),
  667:     Pid ! {self(),apply, M, F, A},
  668:     receive
  669: 	{apply, Res} ->
  670: 	    receive
  671: 		sync ->
  672: 		    Res
  673: 	    end
  674:     end.
  675: 
  676: lambda_slave(Fun) ->
  677:     Pid = get(slave),
  678:     Pid ! {self(), lambda, Fun},
  679:     receive
  680: 	{lambda, Res} ->
  681: 	    receive
  682: 		sync ->
  683: 		    Res
  684: 	    end
  685:     end.
  686: 
  687: relay_n(0, _) ->
  688:     ok;
  689: relay_n(N, Dest) ->
  690:     receive Msg ->
  691: 	    Dest ! {self(), Msg},
  692: 	    relay_n(N-1, Dest)
  693:     end.
  694: 
  695: 
  696: receive_next() ->
  697:     receive_next(infinity).
  698: 
  699: receive_next(TO) ->
  700:     receive
  701: 	M ->
  702: 	    M
  703:     after TO ->
  704: 	    ct:fail(timeout)
  705:     end.
  706: 
  707: receive_no_next(TO) ->
  708:     receive
  709: 	M ->
  710: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, M})
  711:     after
  712: 	TO ->
  713: 	    ok
  714:     end.
  715: 
  716: receive_next_bytag(Tag) ->
  717:     receive_next_bytag(Tag, infinity).
  718: receive_next_bytag(Tag, TO) ->
  719:     receive
  720: 	{Tag, Msg} ->
  721: 	    Msg
  722:     after
  723: 	TO ->
  724: 	    timeout
  725:     end.
